mean_en: "a long speech by one person during a conversation that stops other people from speaking or expressing an opinion; a long speech in a play
sentence: The entire play was just a two-hour monologue by one person; it was so boring!
sentence_trans: 整个演出就是一个人长达两小时的独白，太无聊了。
word_etyma: mono单个，一个 + logue说话 → 一个人说话 → monologue独白
